title: Updated : Now Looking for 3 T206 Commons to Complete the Monster
author: Archive

posts.post_title: Updated : Now Looking for 3 T206 Commons to Complete the Monster
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Joey Settle
I am looking for the following 3 commons to finish up my T206 set, minus the big 4.  Prefer raw cards over slabbed. Looking for cards in PSA1-3 type condition. Please email me if you happen to have these available for sale.  Thanks!

Glenn Liebhardt
Hans Lobert
Jeff Sweeney (New York)

posts.post_title: Updated : Now Looking for 3 T206 Commons to Complete the Monster
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Jantz
Trae R. has a Magee portait posted just down below your post on date Jan-27-08. Its a nice looking raw card. I'm not sure if he still has it, but maybe you can email him. Hope this helps.


Jantz

posts.post_title: Updated : Now Looking for 3 T206 Commons to Complete the Monster
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Trae R.
Jantz, I actually ended up selling that on eBay, but I appreciate it. I am going to edit my listing to indicate such.

Thanks,
-Trae

posts.post_title: Updated : Now Looking for 3 T206 Commons to Complete the Monster
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Joey
Picked up 6 off of the list thanks to David Goeden.  Now down to 10.  Thanks again David!

posts.post_title: Updated : Now Looking for 3 T206 Commons to Complete the Monster
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Jim Dale
Hello,

Have a PSA 3 Larry Doyle Portrait which is a decent 3.  Its a Tolstoi back and I'm primarily a back collector so let me know if you have a Tolstoi you can trade back?  If not send me an offer

jimrdale@hotmail.com

posts.post_title: Updated : Now Looking for 3 T206 Commons to Complete the Monster
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Joey Settle
Thanks to Dave S. for the Magee Portrait.  Trying to work out a trade with Bob Donaldson for 5 more.  The Monster is almost defeated!!

posts.post_title: Updated : Now Looking for 3 T206 Commons to Complete the Monster
posts.post_content:
Posted By: T206Collector
Told you Lobert was going to be tough.  I've held on to my SGC 40 for years looking for an upgrade and just never saw one....

posts.post_title: Updated : Now Looking for 3 T206 Commons to Complete the Monster
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Joey
I realized pretty early on how tuff the Lobert is.  Every time I see one, I always see something I want more.  The last one I saw in perrson was at last years national and I believe they were asking $110 for an SGC40 which I thought was too high.
